nodes.text: Zircon was a planet located within the Zircon system of the Outer Rim Territories.
Lothar the Grouch lived on the seventh moon.

Zircon was mentioned in a Star Wars cameo on the television show Sesame Street, which aired in 1980. This episode was chronicled in Caravan of Courage: Star Wars on Television, an article written by Scott Chernoff that covered a range of Star Wars appearances on television.
